      • loadSpeedControl

        public void loadSpeedControl(MotorSpeedControl spdControl)
        Clears, then sets a speed controller for the motor. The motor must have an active encoder.
        Parameters:
        spdControl - the speed controller to be enabled on the motor

      • deleteSpeedControl

        public void deleteSpeedControl()
        Deletes the existing speed controller.

      • startSpeedControl

        public void startSpeedControl(double targetVal)
        Enables the speed controller on the current motor with the given starting value.
        Parameters:
        targetVal - the value to be passed to the speed controller

      • setSpeedControlTarget

        public void setSpeedControlTarget(double val)
        Sets the speed controller's target - will be used however the speed controller has defined it to be.
        Parameters:
        val - the value to be sent to the speed controller

      • reverseMotor

        public void reverseMotor()
        Inverts the motor; clockwise becomes counterclockwise and vice versa.

      • setPowerScalar

        public void setPowerScalar(double pwrScale)
        Sets the power scalar for the motor
        Parameters:
        pwrScale - the power scalar from 0 to 1 to be used for speeds

        Returns:

        Returns:
